AI Risk Managment Framework

Playbook

MAP

5 Impact Assessment (3)

In this category, AI Actors will carry out an impact assessment by identifying known risks and set up processes to consider emergent risks. At the end of this exercise, AI actors should have sufficient knowledge to make a go/no-go decision.

    Identify Impacts

  • 5.2 Likelihood Analysis

    Likelihood Analysis

  • 5.3 Assessment Impacts
